      • initAnim

        protected void initAnim​(java.lang.String attackFilePath,
                        int attackFrames,
                        java.lang.String idleFilePath,
                        int idleFrames,
                        java.lang.String runFilePath,
                        int runFrames,
                        java.lang.String deadFilePath,
                        int deadFrames,
                        int fps,
                        float scale)
        initialize animations
        Parameters:
        String - file path for attack animation
        int - number of frames in attack animation
        String - file path for idle animation
        int - number of frames in idle animation
        String - file path for running animation
        int - number of frames in running animation
        String - file path for death animation
        int - number of frames in death animation
        int - fps the all animations run at
        float - scale the size of each frame
